Equipment.name: COMPUTER1
Equipment.description: Computer connected to the local ethernet network (bench)

Parameter.name: Model
Parameter.description: LOCAL_COMPUTER or REMOTE_COMPUTER (only LOCAL is currently supported)

Parameter.name: SshPath
Parameter.description: [Optional] full path to local SSH client binary (default 'ssh')

Parameter.name: ScpPath
Parameter.description: [Optional] full path to local SCP client binary (default 'scp')

Parameter.name: IP_TEST
Parameter.description: [Optional] ip address of the equipment from DUT point of view (only required on Conformance Bench)

Parameter.name: key_ssh
Parameter.description: [Optional] RSA Key used for SSH connection
